website_summaries.verdict: Engineered to protect against bumps and bruises while providing grip and strong magnetic pull.
pros: Strong reviews for the case's sturdiness as well as strength in regards to the magnet
We love the smooth button functionality and adaptation to car mounts
High marks for a non-slip case that easily fits iPhone 7 models
cons: While highly protective, it can be a bit bulky for some

customer_reviews.title: Great case until 85° weather.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great case until I brought it to Cancun Mexico. Apparently it cannot handle being in the shade at 85°. It was under my towels and protected from direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Tabora

customer_reviews.title: Love at first hold
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what an amazing case. As others have said, the iPhone 7 fits like a glove. The case is so smooth an refined. I am not in the habit of dropping my phones; if I were I would likely by a Brick type case and fully enclose the phone. But alas, a case for me should complement the phone in both form and function. This as other have said as well, is the nicest case I have had on my phone and is not bulky at all. The internal metal plate is a nice touch as the Ring attachments get old after a while. Simply an awesome case
customer_reviews.author: Luca Caprice

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality Nice to hold and touch Feels rubberized Smooth but grips well Buttons are amazing, big and solid and instant action when pressing. Magnet is strong enough to hold.
customer_reviews.author: abdullah a.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best iPhone cases I've owned
customer_reviews.text: One of the best iPhone cases I've owned. The phone slipped right in and fits perfectly. All controls are functional. The non-slip design of the case is just what I needed (dropped the phone two or three times prior to receiving the case...) and I love the magnetic holder. Fits my vent perfectly and the phone securely. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong, durable case with enough of an edge to keep my phone from breaking when I drop it (and I seem to drop it at least once a week). I love that I can just set it on top of the magnetic holder in my car and it STAYS on perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid Undset

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this case. It definitely adds a bit of bulk to the phone, but not so much that it bothers me or doesn't fit in pockets or bag compartments that it used to fit in. I only noticed the added bulk after I took off the case to clean the inside. The plus side is that I feel like my phone is so well protected now, I have dropped it a few times and it took the damage well. I also LOVE the magnetic feature, the magnet is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good case, does not fit well with my 3ed party charger cable.
customer_reviews.text: Good case, the case buckles with my 3ed party charger plug. Issue resolved by using cable that came with phone. I give the case 3 stars, but the customer service brings the review up to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Chenslee

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but
customer_reviews.text: Hesitated to spend $18 I’m a $10 case person but hard find a nice case with good magnet plate this case is very nice, magnet plate is great love the feel and protects phone very well but one week in and clear coat is peeling see picture I assume it will be much worse in a few weeks to bad it was worth the extra $ until that happened 7/26/20 yup the clear coat peeling just keeps getting worse it’s ugly
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: it slips out of your hands very easily and falls on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I really wish there was a textured grippy back side kind of like the Evutech (sp?) brand.. The button placements are really well done. In my opinion, if people/customers want a phone case with a metal-mountable plate then those shoppers don't want their phone to easily slide away- they are fine when things are grippy. This brand isn't wrong but it needs more real world testing and engineering. Sadly, I'm going back to order another Evutec.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Campos

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t add any bulk to your phone!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this case in the mail a few days ago! It’s perfect! It doesn’t add any bulk to my phone, it’s soft, and it works with magnetic dashboard phone holder! Definitely buying these in multiple colors!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Shook

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Four months in this case started to fall apart, six months later the entire case has peeled away. It’s terribly made, cheap, and does not hold up to even a few months of light use. Save you’re money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Barely a month of use and already the coating is wearing off
customer_reviews.text: For almost a $20 it shouldn't be falling apart after a month of light use. The coating on the top and bottom of the case is already starting to wear. That being said it has protected my phone fairly well. I dropped it while 4-wheeling in the woods last week and there wasn't a scratch on it. Hopefully the structural integrity of the case will continue to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Well the case appears to be nice, feels good in the hand, magnetic back works good. However, sucks against drops!! My phone literally fell off a table in the bathroom, maybe 10” off the ground and now the corner of my phone is cracked. This is the first case out of several that the phone has dropped and cracked. Should have stuck with my Spigen case, never cracked with that one one. Recommend a different case for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Terwilliger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when expected. Looks great, and fits my iPhone7 like a glove! I've only had it for a few days, so I cannot attest to it's durability and value. But I will say, it looks like it will last a long time and doesn't look much different from the ones costing more than twice as much at the AT&T stores!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Smooth yet grippy
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this case. It's not too bulky. Smooth enough for easy pocketing yet doesn't slip from hand. The magnetic plate is awesome for the Wyzgear thing in the car. I looked and looked at cases and didn't find one I liked, until I searched "magnetic." Then there it was. Used it for about a month now. Really glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Nace

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and works well with my magnetic car mount. Good magnet strength.
customer_reviews.author: AVent

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case
customer_reviews.text: Provides enough protection for the phone without a slippery plastic shell. Easy to hold. Nice color too.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put it on my phone. Good quality. Love how classy it looks and doesn’t slipped. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great. Buttons are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fits Great. Buttons are awesome. Are not "mushy" have a positive click feedback. Easy to hold, slides in and out of pocket easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: John Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Best case I ever used!!! You won’t Regret it!!
customer_reviews.text: Best case I ever had. I drop my phone occasionally but normally hard enough to cause damage. I have been using this case for almost a year and it has always protected my phone. But this case if you are looking for something worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ABDUL MOOMIN

customer_reviews.title: Idk how I ever went without this case!
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say that I’ve gone through lots of phone cases as well as phones.. but since getting this case my phone has been safe & sound! Now I don’t even cringe when i accidentally drop my phone.. also the magnet is a lifesaver in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky McBroom

customer_reviews.title: Will protect your phone but it will not look pretty after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the outer layer began to peel. Not an attractive site. The metal plate works great.
customer_reviews.author: Pioneer

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case. I love that the magnet is built in, it’s slim and durable when I’ve dropped it. I’ve bought two so far and will continue to buy them as long as they fit the phone that i have!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Richards

customer_reviews.title: Protects a lot better than my last case
customer_reviews.text: Slick case. Protects a lot better than my last case.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Green

customer_reviews.title: Very durable case
customer_reviews.text: Very durable case. I’m happy that the charger fits with the case still on and all the outside buttons are easily accessible. The case itself is a little bulky in my opinion. It doesn’t fit in the pocket of my scrubs as easily as I’d like it to, but it fits nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The case peels after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of having the built in magnet for use with a mount in the car. And the case looks good at first and isn’t too bulky. But after only about a week or two of use the case has started peeling all around the edge of the phone. Save your money.. if this is what’s happening after 2 weeks I can’t imagine a couple of month.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Too sensitive, does not last
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive, it broke in less than a week of use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and great styling
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this case! Very easy to hold. Rugged, nice easy to push buttons. Magnetic back works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Amato

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Won’t look purdy forever
customer_reviews.text: Rubber backing is falling off already. Works great with my magnet
customer_reviews.author: Romeo

customer_reviews.title: The case is pretty durable, doesn't scratch or tear easily for being ...
customer_reviews.text: The case is pretty durable, doesn't scratch or tear easily for being rubber. The only thing I dislike about it is the charger hole, the iPhone charger's lips catch on the case and after a week of using it, its worn down the edges of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rowles

customer_reviews.title: Buttons work and looks as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Buttons work great. Nice grip. Magnet holds. Looks as pictured. Right price. Solid all around.
customer_reviews.author: Bought This

customer_reviews.title: Great case, mediocre metal plating
customer_reviews.text: I currently use the moxie magnet which works great. Strong magnet, sticks to the fan. But the magnet doesn't stick well to this case, which is why I bought it. I guess I'll settle for the black plate sticker
customer_reviews.author: Justin F

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. Looking to buy one for wife in different color but there is no Area is to view other colors available
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a magnetic case. All contained. No screen saver needed because top half of phone case IS the screen saver. Your case is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice and solid
customer_reviews.text: the magnet inside is really cool and help to keep the case clean
customer_reviews.author: Semion

customer_reviews.title: A steal
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is awesome in this phone case, connected to my magnetic phone mount perfectly plus delivery was super fast!
customer_reviews.author: El Stam

customer_reviews.title: Coating peels in a matter of days
customer_reviews.text: Good: the magnet is strong. Bad: the coating is not durable and comes off easily, totally kills the overall quality. Conclusion: mediocre product and I can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David Y

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Very useful case, it’s very fit for hand to hold.
customer_reviews.author: BEKSULTAN KADYRBERDIEV

customer_reviews.title: Finish peals off immediately
customer_reviews.text: I had this case for 48 hours and the corner started to peal away. After purchasing I read the reviews and saw this is a common problem. Case is okay less the pealing issue
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Burch

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and works perfectly with my magnetic car ...
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit, easy to install and works perfectly with my magnetic car mount.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Very sleek, love the feel of it
customer_reviews.author: Charisse Edwards

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically beautiful and functional, wish there was a bit more protection
customer_reviews.author: Peach

customer_reviews.title: but it tends to fall off easily than other phone cases I have used
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying the texture and the design. I am not sure if it is defective or just case design itsef, but it tends to fall off easily than other phone cases I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: The outer coloring is peeling off. Not a big deal tho
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case for iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: Great case! Shipping was on time and product was as discribed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb case!
customer_reviews.text: Superb case! Both the case itself and the magnetic insert for the car mount.
customer_reviews.author: Alon Rapaport

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is strong enough to use with my vent mounted holder.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Elliott

customer_reviews.title: The buttons on this case feel real good.
customer_reviews.text: The built in buttons on the case make accessing the buttons underneath real easy and real responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Aaronious

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect description
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need - magnetic cover for my iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case !! Made well !! Magnet works great !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Fits well. Like the magnetic function where i can use it on my car mount.
customer_reviews.author: Hon Loong VP92402

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty product but makes the phone bulky. Great for your phone protection.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: It does not have good handling.
customer_reviews.text: This case has sharp edges. It does not have good handling.
customer_reviews.author: Amin Asgharzadeh

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Started pilling after 4-5 months of office use and by month 8 look pretty unpleasant and need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: The case is Awesome. Very durable and well made. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Received case with no buttons to operate the phone. Totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky L Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice case for the price. Fits the phone well, seems quite protective, and has a nice soft feel. The concealed metal plate works great with my Logitech +drive mount. I only wish I had found it before I bought a couple of other cheap cases on here - this one is the winner by far.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is nice. Sturdy, fits well and the buttons on the iPhone are easy to press.
customer_reviews.author: A. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for using with car mount
customer_reviews.text: I found this case when searching for a replacement magnetic case that came with a crossbody purse that I had purchased. I use a Nato mount in my car and had found that the magnetic case worked perfectly with it, but the case had started to break. This case has the protective rim around the face of the phone but it doesn’t feel bulky, fits my chargers perfectly. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but pealing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for about 5 months now and overall it’s been pretty good. Magnet works as well as it did day 1. The grip is still good. I’ve dropped the phone multiple times on hard rocky surfaces and it has not caused any dents, scratches or breaks on the phone. My only complaint is the outer layer that wraps the case started to peel very early, ~2 months of use. At first it was minimal and wasn’t too bad but since there have been about 10 different spots where it’s begun to peel. From what I can tell all this layer does it provide it a more glossy look.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wayyy more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect much out of this case. I figured it wouldn’t stick to magnet real well or would be bulky. Much to my surprise this case was thin, durable and sticks to my mount without ANY movement. Ordered my wife one the following day after receiving this. Highly HIGHLY reccomend for those trying to get away from having a magnet on mounted to your case.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my iPhone 7
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my iPhone 7. The magnetic case works well with magnetic clips for car vents, allowing the phone to be used for visual navigation, if your car (or rentals sometimes in my case) doesn't have navigation.
customer_reviews.author: ToraMori

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Just wish the metal piece for magnet was stronger....My magnet is strong but i find the part in case isn’t detected enough. Not sure how to explain.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I like the case but the magnet is really small so the stupid thing falls off of my magnetic holder all the time. What’s the point of having a magnetic case if the magnet is going to be tiny?
customer_reviews.author: motherpuger

customer_reviews.title: Great case. Perfect for magnetic car mount
customer_reviews.text: Its a very sturdy protective case. Its not very bulky and it mounts to my magnetic holder in my car better than the case that is recommended for it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Breen

customer_reviews.title: Slim and protective
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. A minimalistic case that would protect my phone. I bought this and a screen protector (from another seller) and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: the outer layer started to peel off after one month of use. Review edit: Changed to 5 stars. a replacement was sent and so far over the last 6 months it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Fadi

customer_reviews.title: Missing???
customer_reviews.text: I love it except I do not have the magnetic stand which shows to be a part of this case. Am I mistaken? Or was I dreaming?
customer_reviews.author: Randall Vanaman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice & “buttons” on side very easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. No more sticky pieces on back of my phone. Fit iPhone 7 perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very durable and works well with the magnetic phone holder I already have in my car. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Very good and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good and worth the money. Just drove up the coast over 1,300 miles and it held up perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Sumenek

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the investment
customer_reviews.text: The case is slim, smooth and protective. Slided into a front pocket well. The on-off and volume switches are responsive and the power plug fits perfectly. Great value for the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Mockbee

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic case
customer_reviews.text: This case has a nice feel to it and the magnet works great
customer_reviews.author: Dhack

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! Mounts perfectly to my car magnet.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with how quick I received this item. Just what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lanigan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice case. I am please with the fit on my iPhone 7 and the feel of it when installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk A. Lovin

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and customer service. I would definitely recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: David Oakley

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy it, I returned it.
customer_reviews.text: This case sucks. No one can hear you when you have the case on and you make, or take a call.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Maraia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT , DO YOU HAPPEN TO OFFER THE SAME ITEM ON A IPHONE7 PLUS ?
customer_reviews.author: PAUL GONCALVES

customer_reviews.title: Great Case! Not too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Great Case! Not too bulky, but the back is thick enough that it protects the lens and the front has enough of a lip to keep the glass raised.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIAN C SY

customer_reviews.title: it gives a splendid impression like your iPhone handset
customer_reviews.text: This one case is very extraordinary, stylish and elegant, it gives a splendid impression like your iPhone handset. Will recommend everyone to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jigar_75

customer_reviews.title: It look good, do to bad
customer_reviews.text: It look good ,do to bad. Weather is came late also I though it came with a clip for the car too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ESR iPhone 7 Case, iPhone 7 Magnetic Case,[Slim Fit] [Shock-Absorption] Hard PC Protective Case Cover with Magnetic Car-Mount Function for 4.7 inches iPhone 7 (Black)
product_meta.description:
Buy with confidence, Top Amazon brand ESR Case serves you the best design and quality with unbeatable price. Check the details -> 

Compatibility: 
Compatible with iPhone 7. 

Dual Structure: 
Made with flexible bumper and hard PC back to against drops and shocks. 

Hands-Free: 
Elegance outside, metal plate inside magnetic car-mount friendly. 

Smooth as Silk: 
Smooth finish that feels as good as it looks and the back cover will prevent fingerprints and scratches as well. 

180 Days Warranty: 
Replacement or money back if any happens to our products during the period of warranty.
feature_bullets: Dual Structure: Made with flexible bumper and hard PC back to against drops and shocks.
Hands-Free: Elegance outside, metal plate inside magnetic car-mount friendly.
Smooth as Silk: Smooth finish that feels as good as it looks and the back cover will prevent fingerprints and scratches as well.
Compatibility: iPhone 7 Case compatible with iPhone 7.
180 Days Warranty: Replacement or money back if any happens to our products during the period of warranty.
